item.title: My favorite shortcuts in RStudio
item.description: Currently working on my master’s thesis, I spend almost half on my day on R (the other half being spent reading articles). I have learnt a few very useful shortcuts by reading blog posts or free R books here and there and I have decided to make a small list of those I use most. “Ctrl+Shift+Enter”: run the whole script This combination will run all of your script, wherever the mouse is in the script.
